content: --कर्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having cow's ears. (--र्णः {1} a cow's ear. {2} a mule. {3} a snake. {4} a span (from the tip of the thumb to that of the ring-finger). {5} <ab>N.</ab> of a place of pilgrimage in the south, sacred to Śiva; श्रितगोकर्णनिकेतमीश्वरं <ls>R. 8. 33.</ls> {6} a kind of deer. {7} a kind of arrow.
